EmailTemplate.name: Prepay Set Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Truckers Advantage Fleet One - PrePay and Secured Credit Line Accounts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations! You have been pre-qualified for a Truckers Advantage Fleet One PrePay or Secured Credit Line fuel card account.
SECURED CREDIT LINE ACCOUNTS:
If you choose to open a secured credit line, please complete and return the attached form that is the "Deposit Agreement." Instructions on sending in the funds for this option are on the Deposit Agreement. Please make sure to also return a copy of this form (and a copy of your certified check - minimum of $500) BACK TO ME as well as to the address on the form.
PRE-PAY ACCOUNTS:
We require you to fund a minimum of $500 before we will send out the fuel cards. Please put "{!OnlineApplication__c.Name}" in the place where you would in the future put your account number, this will help me locate the funds and get your cards out faster.
Here are the four options for funding your pre-pay account.
· Bank Wire:
Fleet One will receive your funds within 3-5 business hours and a $15 fee will be charged to receive your wire.
(Bank instructions are attached)
· Factoring:
Your factoring company either sends us a bank wire, or do a customer initiated ACH. Please note: There is no charge for funding your Fleet One account through Fleet One Factoring! Please let me know if you are interested in having me arrange a phone conversation between a Fleet One Factoring Rep and you!!
· 3rd Party Guaranteed Check:
Fast & Inexpensive- These are checks like Com-chek, EFS Check, T-Chek, etc. Fleet One will charge $25.00 fee to accept one of these checks, and your funds will be available within 1-4 business hours, if it’s deposited during Fleet One’s business hours (8a-5p CST M-F)
Now Available! -- Western Union:
To successfully make a WESTERN UNION payment, please follow the attached instructions! (Fleet One will invoice a $20 fee per occurrence.)
If you have any questions please do not hesitate to call.
Thanks,
